lines.text: Did you ever figure that maybe I won't get back?
You'll make it. People only die when they have something to live for.
I know. That's why I'm a little worried...for the first time.
You sure must need those ten big dollars a day the Army paid you to come up here.
Well, I never thought I'd see the day.
That's the point, isn't it? To live to see the day.
[Frank and Ward contemplate descending a near vertical hillside]
Has a horse ever been down through there before?
A horse has got too much sense to try.
What do you think of the entire plan of action?
The plan is based upon what Diablito should do. You better be ready for what he can't possibly do, but probably will.
[Frank and Ward are pursued by Indians]
I say it ain't much time before they pick up our trail.
Time is what gives a man gray hair.
